text: And my experience was I wasn't very good at getting that right, and Probably 90% of my colleagues in the House of Commons, I felt, were really damaged by the profession.

I think it could have been very powerful in finding a middle way towards a soft Brexit if we'd been brave enough to do it in Britain, and I think it's a very good thing to do on renewables because there's people who listen to yesterday's podcast Will have picked up.
